title: New Yorker Article on Matthew Carter
content:
Hi all,  
There is a great article on typography and specifically Matthew Carter in this week’s New Yorker (Dec. 5), page 56. Quite a good read!

“Choosing wine in a store, Carter looks for a bottle that has type he designed on the label.”

-Will
